name: C64 Rescue
overview: An action game created by Andrew S. Pakerski and published in Loadstar #016. You have landed on a distant planet. As you fly your lander module over the surface of the planet, you see your fellow astronauts drifting through space. There's only one thing to do. You must maneuver your craft into their path so they can grab on and climb to safety. The object of C-64 Rescue is to use your lunar lander to to rescue as many astronauts as you can in a limited amount of time.
